pages.text: $(l)Core: Cobblestone Generator$() represents a device that water meets lava to form cobblestone. $(br2)Place a cobblestone upon using. $(br2)Cannot be put in automatic collector since it can only place and cannot break.Please refer to $(l:3_technical_cores/cobblestone_generator_automated)Core: Cobblestone Generator (automated)$() for automatically generating cobblestones.
